analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern the establishment, modification, continuation, or termination of various advisory committees, commissions, boards, councils, and task forces within the Executive Branch. These entities are created to provide advice and recommendations to the President and various federal agencies on a wide range of issues, including national security, economic policy, public health, international relations, and domestic affairs. The documents also address administrative matters such as membership, functions, reporting requirements, and funding for these advisory bodies.
title: Presidential Advisory Groups
